DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Treatment Questionnaire After Surgery Go Home With Catheter True False Unsure Indicator

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Treatment Questionnaire After Surgery Go Home With Catheter
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._A primary or metastatic malignant tumor involving the prostate gland.  The vast majority are carcinomas._A flexible tube designed to transfer fluids into or out of the body._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures._A person's permanent place of residence._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
